lexiemayer.name: Lexie
lexiemayer.desc: Lexie Mayer. She is the station Nurse. She is kind, always wanting to help others. Always is saying sarcastic jokes to lighten the mood of others.

sarahforrest.name: Sarah
sarahforrest.desc: Sarah Forrest. Jealous, condescending, inconsiderate towards others. Is always being fake towards everyone. Very selfish and believes she is the most important/intelligent one in the team. Is one of the Engineers present on the ship.

tyancriploens.name: Tyan
tyancriploens.desc:
Tyan Criploens. He's an incredibly smart computer scientist, who really knows how 
to work around software. 
He has been your best friend since stepped foot onto the space craft.
